name: places/ChIJoSy2AQf0wokRTt_krw1mevw
formattedAddress: 54 Sherman Ave, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 54 Sherman Ave, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: IF YOU ARE A BLACK WOMAN do not go to this hair salon. They were nasty to me the minute I walked in. No one greeted me, answered my questions or did anything I asked. It was a last minute stop before new years and all I wanted was a blow out and a trim. None of their bottles are labeled. They do whatever they want and are entirely too rough when washing your hair. Not to mention that shop is NASTY. It is infested with roaches. I am now being forced to cut my long natural curly hair because of whatever products they used. My hair smelled like burnt chemicals for almost 2 weeks and was coming out in clumps after washing it. This place should be closed ASAP!! I will definitely be reporting them.

Not to mention that shop is NASTY. It is infested with roaches. I am now being forced to cut my long natural curly hair because of whatever products they used. My hair smelled like burnt chemicals for almost 2 weeks and was coming out in clumps after washing it. This place should be closed ASAP!! I will definitely be reporting them.

originalText.text: I will leave a review everyday until the owner agrees to meet with me. I brought my fiancé here. They were questioning why her hair is black and how she got it so dark. Her NATURAL HAIR! They weren’t the most pleasant but the place had decent reviews. Her first wash after getting a wash and blow dry from this place and it was falling out in clumps. It smelled funny, from some chemical they put in there. They wouldn’t answer any of her questions, and were being quick spraying unlabeled bottles in her hair. Even when she declined. They ignoring her and apologizing after it was already done. She lost so much hair! Watching her cry and hurt like that, was the worst! DO NOT COME HERE!!!!!! I will leave a review every single day since the owner won’t meet with me!
